columns.Last Name: VARCHAR - Applicant's last name/surname. Use: "Last Name"
columns.Present Position: VARCHAR - Current job position or role. Use: "Present Position"
columns.Name of Home Institution: VARCHAR - Name of applicant's home institution. Use: "Name of Home Institution"
columns.Location of Home Institution: VARCHAR - Geographic location of home institution. Use: "Location of Home Institution"
columns.Contact E-Mail address: VARCHAR - Email address for contact. Use: "Contact E-Mail address"
columns.Academic Degree(s) (and / or Training): VARCHAR - Academic qualifications and degrees. Use: "Academic Degree(s) (and / or Training)"
columns.PhD_Year: INTEGER - Year when PhD was obtained
columns.Title of proposed project: VARCHAR - Title of the fellowship project proposal. Use: "Title of proposed project"
columns.Thematic relation: VARCHAR - How project relates to program themes. Use: "Thematic relation"
columns.Begin of Fellowship: DATE - Proposed fellowship start date. Use: "Begin of Fellowship"
columns.End of Fellowship: DATE - Proposed fellowship end date. Use: "End of Fellowship"
columns.Advisory Board Reviewer 1: VARCHAR - Name of first advisory board reviewer. Use: "Advisory Board Reviewer 1"
columns.Advisory Board Reviewer 2: VARCHAR - Name of second advisory board reviewer. Use: "Advisory Board Reviewer 2"
columns.Review Katja: VARCHAR - Review comments from Katja. Use: "Review Katja"
columns.Review Manuel: VARCHAR - Review comments from Manuel. Use: "Review Manuel"
columns.Rating Katja: VARCHAR - Rating grade from Katja (A, B, C, etc.). Use: "Rating Katja"
columns.Rating Manuel: VARCHAR - Rating grade from Manuel (A, B, C, etc.). Use: "Rating Manuel"
columns.Comments: VARCHAR - Additional comments or notes about the application

notes: IMPORTANT: Column names with spaces MUST be enclosed in DOUBLE QUOTES in SQL queries for DuckDB
Example: SELECT "Last Name", Gender, Track FROM testlistAIA
Simple column names like Country, Gender, Track, Discipline, Comments do NOT need quotes
Always use "Column Name" syntax for: Last Name, Name(s), Present Position, Rating Katja, Rating Manuel, etc.

applicants_by_track.description: Number of applicants per track (Academic vs Professional)

examples.pattern: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_applicants FROM testlistAIA
SELECT Track, COUNT(*) as count FROM testlistAIA GROUP BY Track ORDER BY count DESC

examples.description: Top 5 countries by number of applicants
examples.pattern: SELECT Country, COUNT(*) as applicant_count FROM testlistAIA GROUP BY Country ORDER BY applicant_count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(Duration_Months) as avg_duration_months FROM testlistAIA WHERE Duration_Months IS NOT NULL

examples.description: Applicants with highest ratings from both reviewers
examples.pattern: SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", Country, "Rating Katja", "Rating Manuel" FROM testlistAIA WHERE "Rating Katja" = 'A' AND "Rating Manuel" = 'A'
SELECT Gender, COUNT(*) as count FROM testlistAIA GROUP BY Gender
SELECT Discipline, COUNT(*) as count FROM testlistAIA GROUP BY Discipline ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", "Begin of Fellowship", "End of Fellowship" FROM testlistAIA WHERE "Begin of Fellowship" LIKE '%2024%'

examples.description: Applicants with Rating A from Katja
examples.pattern: SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", Country, "Rating Katja" FROM testlistAIA WHERE "Rating Katja" = 'A'

examples.description: Applicants with Rating A from both reviewers
examples.pattern: SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", Country, "Rating Katja", "Rating Manuel" FROM testlistAIA WHERE "Rating Katja" = 'A' AND "Rating Manuel" = 'A'

examples.description: Count applicants with Rating B or better
examples.pattern: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM testlistAIA WHERE "Rating Katja" IN ('A', 'B') OR "Rating Manuel" IN ('A', 'B')
SELECT AVG(Duration_Months) as avg_duration FROM testlistAIA WHERE Duration_Months IS NOT NULL
SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", Duration_Months FROM testlistAIA WHERE Duration_Months IS NOT NULL ORDER BY Duration_Months DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", Country, Duration_Months FROM testlistAIA WHERE Duration_Months > 10
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM testlistAIA WHERE Country = 'Germany' AND Gender = 'f'

examples.description: Male applicants in Academic Track from Afghanistan
examples.pattern: SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", Track, Gender FROM testlistAIA WHERE Track = 'A' AND Gender = 'm' AND Country = 'Afghanistan'
SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", "Rating Katja", "Rating Manuel" FROM testlistAIA WHERE Country = 'Germany' AND ("Rating Katja" = 'A' OR "Rating Manuel" = 'A')
SELECT Country, Gender, COUNT(*) as count FROM testlistAIA GROUP BY Country, Gender ORDER BY Country, Gender
SELECT Country, COUNT(*) as count FROM testlistAIA WHERE Track = 'A' GROUP BY Country ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", Country FROM testlistAIA WHERE Country IN ('Germany', 'Afghanistan', 'Nigeria')
SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", PhD_Year, Discipline FROM testlistAIA WHERE PhD_Year > 2020
SELECT Track, COUNT(*) as total FROM testlistAIA GROUP BY Track
SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", "Rating Katja", "Rating Manuel" FROM testlistAIA WHERE Gender = 'f'
SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", Track FROM testlistAIA WHERE Track = 'not indicated' OR Track IS NULL
SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", Duration_Months FROM testlistAIA WHERE Duration_Months BETWEEN 6 AND 12
SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", Discipline, Country FROM testlistAIA WHERE Discipline LIKE '%Computer%' OR Discipline LIKE '%Engineering%'
SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", Duration_Months, Country FROM testlistAIA ORDER BY Duration_Months DESC LIMIT 10

examples.description: Applicants grouped by Track and Gender
examples.pattern: SELECT Track, Gender, COUNT(*) as count FROM testlistAIA GROUP BY Track, Gender
SELECT Country, COUNT(*) as count FROM testlistAIA GROUP BY Country HAVING COUNT(*) > 5

examples.description: Applicants with different ratings from reviewers
examples.pattern: SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", "Rating Katja", "Rating Manuel" FROM testlistAIA WHERE "Rating Katja" != "Rating Manuel"
SELECT Gender, COUNT(*) as count FROM testlistAIA WHERE Track = 'P' GROUP BY Gender
SELECT "Last Name", "Name(s)", PhD_Year, Duration_Months FROM testlistAIA WHERE PhD_Year IS NULL OR Duration_Months IS NULL

glossary.Track: Application track: A = Academic (researchers with PhD), P = Professional (practitioners without PhD requirement)
glossary.Gender: Gender codes: f = female, m = male, d = diverse/non-binary
glossary.Rating: Assessment grade: A = Excellent, B = Good, C = Satisfactory, lower grades indicate concerns
glossary.Fellowship Duration: Length of proposed fellowship in months (Duration_Months column), typically ranging from 3-12 months
glossary.Home Institution: The applicant's current affiliated organization (university, research center, company)
glossary.Thematic relation: How the proposed project connects to the fellowship program's focus areas
